name: Pubsub to Firestore
description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that reads messages from Pub/Sub, uses Beam SQL to transform the message data, and writes the results to firestore

parameters.name: firestoreProject
parameters.label: Firestore project id
parameters.helpText: Firestore project id used while constructing the document path

parameters.name: firestoreCollection
parameters.label: Firestore collection name
parameters.helpText: Firestore collection name used while constructing the document path
